title: Roast beetroot and potato soup
ingredients: ['300g diced potatoes', '275g diced peeled beetroot', 'olive oil, divided', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 celery stalk, diced', '1 onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1L chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', '350ml whole milk', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
